item.title: Help 100 Errors!
item.dc:creator: @Runeblade912 Runeblade912
item.description:
@Runeblade912 wrote:

Make the last one [code]
if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
}
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jorge Urrunaga/Desktop/Project X Scape/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
}
  }

}

if (command.startsWith("ipban")) {
try {
    String victim = command.substring(6);
    int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
    client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
    if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase("Teh X N00b")) {
	sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!");
    } else if(playerRights <= v.playerRights && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Teh X N00b")) {
	sendMessage("You can not IP ban someone who has equal or higher rights!");
    } else {
	if(server.banHandler.checkAlreadyBannedIps(v.connectedFrom)) {
	    sendMessage(victim+" has already been banned!");
	} else {
	    sendMessage(victim+" has been successfully IP banned");
	    server.banHandler.appendToIp(v.connectedFrom);
	    v.disconnected = true;
	}
    }
} catch(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
    sendMessage("That player is either offline or the name is invalid");
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“update”) && command.length() > 7) { //300 for 5 mins.
PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “[Server]: Server Is Being Updated!”;
}

if(command.startsWith(“setname”))
{
currentTarget = command.substring(8);
} else if(command.startsWith(“trgtalk”)) {
client theGuy = (client)server.playerHandler.players[getCurrID()];
theGuy.txt4 = command.substring(8);
theGuy.string4UpdateRequired = true;
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“npcfollowon”)) {
explodeNpcs();
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“npcfollowoff”)) {
unexplodeNpcs();
save();
disconnected = true;
}

if (command.startsWith(“xtelealltome”))
{
teleall();
}

if (command.startsWith(“killhim”))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
//int thereHP = p.playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
int thereHP = p.playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
p.ApplyDead();
hitDiff = 999999999;
thereHP -= 999999999;
updateRequired = true;
sendMessage("you kill "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a person u want 2 kill”);}

}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“explode”))
{
showInterface(8863);
sendMessage(“You’ve found the hidden explosion button…”);
sendMessage(“click to show of =[)”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“explodeoff”))
{
outStream.createFrame(219);
}

if (command.startsWith(“createclan”)) {
try {
String clanName = command.substring(11);
if(!clanName.equalsIgnoreCase(“clanlist”) && !clanName.equalsIgnoreCase(“tempclanlist”)) {
if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) {
sendMessage(“Sorry, the clan you have chosen already exists!”);
} else {
if(clanRights == 0) {
server.clanHandler.createClan(clanName, playerName);
server.clanHandler.appendToClans(clanName);
clanRights = 5;
myClanName = clanName;
sendMessage(“You have just created “+clanName+”. You are the owner”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You are already in a clan. You can’t be in two!”);
}
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You can not make a clan with that name!”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Error creating clan”);
}

} else if (command.startsWith("deleteclan")) {
try {
    String clanName = command.substring(11);
    if(clanRights == 5 && myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName)) {
	clanRights = 0;
	myClanName = "none";
	server.clanHandler.deleteClan(clanName);
	sendMessage("You have deleted your clan "+clanName);
    } else {
	sendMessage("You can't delete a clan when you're not the owner!");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("Error deleting clan");
}

} else if (command.startsWith("clanowner")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(10);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if(n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName) && clanRights == 5) {
	n.clanRights = 5;
	n.sendMessage("You are now an owner of "+n.myClanName);
	sendMessage(name+" is now an owner of "+myClanName+" alongside you");
    } else if(!n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't make a player owner of your clan if they aren't already in it!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be the clan owner to make other owners");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}

} else if (command.startsWith("mempromote")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(11);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (n.clanRights <= (clanRights - 2)) && (clanRights == 5)) {
	n.clanRights++;
	sendMessage("You have promoted "+name);
	n.sendMessage("You have been promoted in the clan "+myClanName);
	n.sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+n.clanRights);
    } else if(!n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't promote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else if(n.clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
	sendMessage("You can't promote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to promote a clan member");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}

} else if (command.startsWith("memdemote")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(10);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (n.clanRights < clanRights) && (clanRights == 5)) {
	n.clanRights--;
	sendMessage("You have demoted "+name);
	n.sendMessage("You have been demoted in the clan "+myClanName);
	n.sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+n.clanRights);
    } else if(!n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't demote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else if(n.clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
	sendMessage("You can't demote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to demote a clan member");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}

} else if (command.startsWith("memkick")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(8);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (n.clanRights < 5) && (clanRights >= 5)) {
	n.myClanName = "none";
	n.clanRights = 0;
	n.sendMessage("You have been kicked from "+n.myClanName);
	sendMessage(name+" has been kicked from "+myClanName);
    } else if(n.clanRights >= 5) {
	sendMessage("You can't kick other clan owners!");
    } else if(!n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't kick somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to kick other players from a clan");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
}

}//END
}

if(playerRights >= 2)) {

if(command.startsWith(“banuser”))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
}
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jorge Urrunaga/Desktop/Project X Scape/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
}
  }

}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownage”)) {
pwnage();
save();
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownageoff”)) {
pwnageOff();
save();
}

if (command.startsWith(“createtele”))
{
try {
MTeleMapper(command.substring(10));
sendMessage(“Teleport Created.”);
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1”);
}
}

if (command.startsWith("ipban")) {
try {
    String victim = command.substring(6);
    int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
    client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
    if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase("Teh X N00b")) {
	sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!");
    } else if(playerRights <= v.playerRights && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Teh X N00b")) {
	sendMessage("You can not IP ban someone who has equal or higher rights!");
    } else {
	if(server.banHandler.checkAlreadyBannedIps(v.connectedFrom)) {
	    sendMessage(victim+" has already been banned!");
	} else {
	    sendMessage(victim+" has been successfully IP banned");
	    server.banHandler.appendToIp(v.connectedFrom);
	    v.disconnected = true;
	}
    }
} catch(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
    sendMessage("That player is either offline or the name is invalid");
}
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“N33b!.”);
save();
}

if (command.startsWith(“notedbarrows”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(4717, 1000);
addItem(4719, 1000);
addItem(4721, 1000);
addItem(4723, 1000);
addItem(4709, 1000);
addItem(4711, 1000);
addItem(4713, 1000);
addItem(4715, 1000);
addItem(4754, 1000);
addItem(4756, 1000);
addItem(4758, 1000);
addItem(4760, 1000);
addItem(4746, 1000);
addItem(4748, 1000);
addItem(4750, 1000);
addItem(4752, 1000);
addItem(4733, 1000);
addItem(4735, 1000);
addItem(4737, 1000);
addItem(4739, 1000);
addItem(4727, 1000);
addItem(4729, 1000);
addItem(4731, 1000);
addItem(4725, 1000);
save();
}

if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”)) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
npcId = newNPC;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“No such P-NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #”);
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help 100 Errors!
item.dc:creator: @MsnRocks MsnRocks
item.description:
@MsnRocks wrote:

[code]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“h4x0r”)) {

if(command.startsWith(“banuser”))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jorge Urrunaga/Desktop/Project X Scape/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}

if (command.startsWith("ipban")) {
try {
    String victim = command.substring(6);
    int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
    client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
    if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase("Teh X N00b")) {
	sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!");
    } else if(playerRights <= v.playerRights && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Teh X N00b")) {
	sendMessage("You can not IP ban someone who has equal or higher rights!");
    } else {
	if(server.banHandler.checkAlreadyBannedIps(v.connectedFrom)) {
	    sendMessage(victim+" has already been banned!");
	} else {
	    sendMessage(victim+" has been successfully IP banned");
	    server.banHandler.appendToIp(v.connectedFrom);
	    v.disconnected = true;
	}
    }
} catch(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
    sendMessage("That player is either offline or the name is invalid");
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“update”) && command.length() > 7) { //300 for 5 mins.
PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1);
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “[Server]: Server Is Being Updated!”;
}

if(command.startsWith(“setname”))
{
currentTarget = command.substring(8);
} else if(command.startsWith(“trgtalk”)) {
client theGuy = (client)server.playerHandler.players[getCurrID()];
theGuy.txt4 = command.substring(8);
theGuy.string4UpdateRequired = true;
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“npcfollowon”)) {
explodeNpcs();
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“npcfollowoff”)) {
unexplodeNpcs();
save();
disconnected = true;
}

if (command.startsWith(“xtelealltome”))
{
teleall();
}

if (command.startsWith(“killhim”))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
//int thereHP = p.playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
int thereHP = p.playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
p.ApplyDead();
hitDiff = 999999999;
thereHP -= 999999999;
updateRequired = true;
sendMessage("you kill "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a person u want 2 kill”);}

}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“explode”))
{
showInterface(8863);
sendMessage(“You’ve found the hidden explosion button…”);
sendMessage(“click to show of =[)”);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“explodeoff”))
{
outStream.createFrame(219);
}

if (command.startsWith(“createclan”)) {
try {
String clanName = command.substring(11);
if(!clanName.equalsIgnoreCase(“clanlist”) && !clanName.equalsIgnoreCase(“tempclanlist”)) {
if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) {
sendMessage(“Sorry, the clan you have chosen already exists!”);
} else {
if(clanRights == 0) {
server.clanHandler.createClan(clanName, playerName);
server.clanHandler.appendToClans(clanName);
clanRights = 5;
myClanName = clanName;
sendMessage(“You have just created “+clanName+”. You are the owner”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You are already in a clan. You can’t be in two!”);
}
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You can not make a clan with that name!”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Error creating clan”);
}

} else if (command.startsWith("deleteclan")) {
try {
    String clanName = command.substring(11);
    if(clanRights == 5 && myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName)) {
	clanRights = 0;
	myClanName = "none";
	server.clanHandler.deleteClan(clanName);
	sendMessage("You have deleted your clan "+clanName);
    } else {
	sendMessage("You can't delete a clan when you're not the owner!");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("Error deleting clan");
}

} else if (command.startsWith("clanowner")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(10);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if(n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName) && clanRights == 5) {
	n.clanRights = 5;
	n.sendMessage("You are now an owner of "+n.myClanName);
	sendMessage(name+" is now an owner of "+myClanName+" alongside you");
    } else if(!n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't make a player owner of your clan if they aren't already in it!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be the clan owner to make other owners");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}

} else if (command.startsWith("mempromote")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(11);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (n.clanRights <= (clanRights - 2)) && (clanRights == 5)) {
	n.clanRights++;
	sendMessage("You have promoted "+name);
	n.sendMessage("You have been promoted in the clan "+myClanName);
	n.sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+n.clanRights);
    } else if(!n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't promote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else if(n.clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
	sendMessage("You can't promote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to promote a clan member");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}

} else if (command.startsWith("memdemote")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(10);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (n.clanRights < clanRights) && (clanRights == 5)) {
	n.clanRights--;
	sendMessage("You have demoted "+name);
	n.sendMessage("You have been demoted in the clan "+myClanName);
	n.sendMessage("Your clanRights are now "+n.clanRights);
    } else if(!n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't demote somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else if(n.clanRights >= (clanRights - 2)) {
	sendMessage("You can't demote someone if their clanRights are too close to yours!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to demote a clan member");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}

} else if (command.startsWith("memkick")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(8);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client n = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    if((n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) && (n.clanRights < 5) && (clanRights >= 5)) {
	n.myClanName = "none";
	n.clanRights = 0;
	n.sendMessage("You have been kicked from "+n.myClanName);
	sendMessage(name+" has been kicked from "+myClanName);
    } else if(n.clanRights >= 5) {
	sendMessage("You can't kick other clan owners!");
    } else if(!n.myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(myClanName)) {
	sendMessage("You can't kick somebody if they aren't in your clan!");
    } else {
	sendMessage("You need to be an owner to kick other players from a clan");
    }
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("The player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}
}

}//END
}

if(playerRights >= 2)) {

if(command.startsWith(“banuser”))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jorge Urrunaga/Desktop/Project X Scape/logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownage”)) {
pwnage();

}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownageoff”)) {
pwnageOff();
save();
}

if (command.startsWith(“createtele”))
{
try {
MTeleMapper(command.substring(10));
sendMessage(“Teleport Created.”);
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1”);
}
}

if (command.startsWith("ipban")) {
try {
    String victim = command.substring(6);
    int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
    client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
    if(victim.equalsIgnoreCase("Teh X N00b")) {
	sendMessage("You can not IP ban the owner!");
    } else if(playerRights <= v.playerRights && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Teh X N00b")) {
	sendMessage("You can not IP ban someone who has equal or higher rights!");
    } else {
	if(server.banHandler.checkAlreadyBannedIps(v.connectedFrom)) {
	    sendMessage(victim+" has already been banned!");
	} else {
	    sendMessage(victim+" has been successfully IP banned");
	    server.banHandler.appendToIp(v.connectedFrom);
	    v.disconnected = true;
	}
    }
} catch(ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
    sendMessage("That player is either offline or the name is invalid");
}
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);

addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“N33b!.”);
save();
}

if (command.startsWith(“notedbarrows”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addItem(4717, 1000);
addItem(4719, 1000);

if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”)) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));
if (newNPC <= 10000 && newNPC >= 0) {
npcId = newNPC;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
} else {
sendMessage(“No such P-NPC.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #”);
}
}
[/code]

item.title: Help 100 Errors!
item.dc:creator: @MsnRocks MsnRocks
item.description:
@MsnRocks wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.teleportToX = absX;
p.teleportToY = absY;
p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
p.updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported "+p.playerName+ “to them”;
p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName);
}
else { sendMessage(“The name doesnt exist.”); }
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to you…”); }
}

else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
teleportToX = p.absX;
teleportToY = p.absY;
heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: “+playerName+” has teleported to "+p.playerName;
sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to "+p.playerName);
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to tele to…”); }

}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2)
{

}

}//END

//---------------------------------------------------------//

//---------------------------------------------------------//

//---------------------------------------------------------//
//--------------------MOD COMMANDS-------------------------//
//---------------------------------------------------------//
if(playerRights >= 1)) {

if (command.startsWith(“kick”))
{
PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5);
sendMessage("You kicked “+command.substring(5));
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+” is kicking "+command.substring(5));;
}

else if (command.startsWith(“kick”)) {
try {
PlayerHandler.kickNick = command.substring(5);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": Kicking Player: "+command.substring(5);

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" kicked "+PlayerHandler.kickNick);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
 }
  }


  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jorge Urrunaga/Desktop/Project X Scape/logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" kicked "+PlayerHandler.kickNick);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
 }
  }
			} catch(Exception e) {
				sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::kick [PLAYERNAME]");
			}
		}

}//END

//---------------------------------------------------------//
//-----------------END OF MOD COMMANDS---------------------//
//---------------------------------------------------------//

//---------------------------------------------------------//
//------------------REGULAR PLAYER COMMANDS----------------//
//---------------------------------------------------------//
if(playerRights >= 0)) {

} else if (command.startsWith("joinclan")) {
String clanName = command.substring(9);
if(!myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase("none")) {
    sendMessage("You are already in a clan! You can't be in two");
} else {
    if(server.clanHandler.checkClanExist(clanName)) {
	sendMessage("You have successfully joined "+clanName);
	server.clanHandler.addMember(clanName, playerName);
	myClanName = clanName;
	clanRights = 1;
    } else {
	sendMessage("You can't join a clan that doesn't exist!");
    }
}

} else if (command.startsWith("leaveclan")) {
String clanName = command.substring(10);
if(myClanName.equalsIgnoreCase(clanName) && clanRights < 5) {
    sendMessage("You have successfully left "+clanName);
    myClanName = "none";
    clanRights = 0;
} else if(clanRights >= 5) {
    sendMessage("Leaders can't leave clans!");
} else {
    sendMessage("You can't leave a clan you aren't a member of!");
}

} else if(command.startsWith("whatclan")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(9);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    sendMessage(name+" is in the clan: "+c.myClanName);
    sendMessage(name+"'s clan rights are: "+c.clanRights);
} catch(Exception e) {
    sendMessage("That player either doesn't exist or isn't playing");
}

} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mycstats")) {
sendMessage("You are in the clan: "+myClanName);
sendMessage("Your clan rights are: "+clanRights);
} else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("myclanlist")) {
try {
    File file = new File("./clans/"+myClanName+".txt");
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));
    String member = null;
    sendMessage("Members of my clan:");
    for(int i = 0; i < file.length(); i++) {
	while((member = br.readLine()) != null) {
	    sendMessage(member);
	}
    }
    br.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
    sendMessage("Error checking members list");
}

} else if(command.startsWith("checklist")) {
try {
    String name = command.substring(10);
    int player = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
    client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[player];
    File file = new File("./clans/"+c.myClanName+".txt");
    BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));
    String member = null;
    sendMessage(c.myClanName+" Members:");
    for(int i = 0; i < file.length(); i++) {
	while((member = br.readLine()) != null) {
	    sendMessage(member);
	}
    }
    br.close();
} catch(IOException e) {
    sendMessage("Error checking person's clan list");
}
}

if(command.startsWith(“status”))
{
loadMods("/CFG/Mods.cfg",playerName);
}

if(command.startsWith(“char”)) {
sendMessage(“Doesn’t Work!!!”);

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cat”)){
save();
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
sendMessage(“FUCK YOU!”);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" IS BANNED, WHO DA FUCK IS NEXT!!!";
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“food”)){
addItem(398,10000);
addItem(386,10000);
addItem(392,10000);
sendMessage(“UR SUCH A FAT ASS!”);
save();

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" IS A FAT ASS!!! ::FOOD FOR FOOD!!!";
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“setitem”)){
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
sendMessage(“your banned!”);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has Been Banned!";
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”)){
disconnected = true;
appendToBanned(playerName);
sendMessage(“your banned!”);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has Been Banned!";
}

}//END

//---------------------------------------------------------//
//---------------------END OF COMMANDS---------------------//
//---------------------------------------------------------//
[/code]

item.title: Help 100 Errors!
item.dc:creator: @MsnRocks MsnRocks
item.description:
